snippet: President Obama is meeting with foreign leaders at the Group of 7 meetings in Brussels to discuss energy, climate change and, of course, the conflict between Russia and Ukraine that led to Russia’s exclusion from the meetings.
abstract: President Obama is meeting with foreign leaders at the Group of 7 meetings in Brussels to discuss energy, climate change and, of course, the conflict between Russia and Ukraine that led to Russia’s exclusion from the meetings.

headline.main: What's News in Washington: Obama Talks Climate Change at Summit
